title: Riot should make games end quicker, it just takes too much time to climb with how long games last

replies.body:
http://wpmedia.theprovince.com/2016/10/benningfacepalm-f1341964f541e5f68a5c94a0a0fb7300.gif?w=740&h=548

wish there was some sort of structure, like a fortified building or something, that you had to get past before you could walk straight into somebody's base
That's not ok... I'd leave the game if I had to play for that long

Why can't we get a surrender at Champ select.   GAWD












Kappa
To be fair in a game where teams are somewhat balanced on both sides, Morde can overrun your base at the 15 minute mark. I can guarantee you, every Morde main/player has done this atleast once
Thats because they opened mid, dont try to make your post biased when you leave out context. The whole enemy team afk and you took down their base, happens all the time in diamond elo.
so thats how you counter the ardent censor meta, end the game before they can but it!
i had a 5 minute ranked game and i didnt get ip or lp for it
